title: Put a blacklight behind the Championship Thresh figure to wonderous results!
body: Finally received my Championship Thresh (and a few other goodies). Decided to put a black light behind it because the blue fire-y stuff is a little is a little translucent so I wanted to see what would happen. I can say I was pleased by the results :)

replies.body:
I tried! [I think I did it right.... ](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3pkxfy/i_put_a_blacklight_behind_the_championship_thresh/)

I've never used reddit before :/ really wish they had a preview button like here.....
Nice. You quickly went to page 2!
:O I did? I will have to go and find it!
